# Build results
bin/
obj/
out/

# User-specific files
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Mono
*.pidb
*.userprefs

# Visual Studio generated files
.vs/

# Test results
TestResult*/
*.VisualState.xml
*.vsp
*.vspscc
*.vssscc
*.coverage
*.coveragexml

# NuGet
*.nupkg
# The packages folder can be ignored because of restore
**/packages/*
# except build/, which is used as an MSBuild target.
!**/packages/build/
*.nuget.props
*.nuget.targets

# Others
*.log
*.tlog
*.cache
*.pdb
*.exe
*.dll

# OS specific
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Rider / JetBrains IDE
.idea/
*.iml

# Resharper
_ReSharper*/
*.[Rr]e[Ss]harper
*.DotSettings.user
